name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
schedule:
Week 1	Course Introduction
Week 2	Formal Letter Writing
Week 3     Formal Letter Writing cont.
Week 4     Essay Writing: Cause and Effect
Week 5	Essay Writing: Cause and Effect cont.
Week 6	Essay Writing: Cause and Effect cont.
Week 7	T-Unit
Week 8	T-Unit cont.
Week 9	Essay Writing: Argumentative
Week 10	Essay Writing: Argumentative cont.
Week 11	Essay Writing: Argumentative cont.
Week 12	Readability
Week 13	Readability cont.
Week 14	Readability cont.
Week 15	Essay Writing: Comparison & Contrast
Weel 16	Essay Writing: Comparison & Contrast cont.
Week 17	Essay Writing: Comparison & Contrast cont.
Week 18	Final Exam
scorePolicy: Class Activities & Pop Quizzes (15%); Peer Writing Evaluation (15%); Writing Assignments & Final Exam (70%).
materials:
Required Textbooks:
Donald, Robert B., Morrow, Betty R., Wargetz, Lillian G., & Werner, Kathleen. (1995). Writing Clear Essays (3rd). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.
Donald, Robert B., Moore, James D., Morrow, Betty R., Wargetz, Lillian G., & Werner, Kathleen. (1998). Writing Clear Paragraphs (6th). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.
References:
Azar, Betty S. (1998.) Understanding and Using English Grammar (3rd). White Plains, NY: Pearson Education.
Butler, Eugenia, Hickman, Mary A., McAlexander, Patricia J., & Overby, Lalla. (1995). Correct Writing (6th). Lexington, MA: D. C. Health and Company.
Frank, Marcella. (2003). Modern English Part II: Sentences & Complex Structures (2nd). Taipei, Taiwan: Pearson Education Taiwan.
Frank, Marcella. (1986). Modern English Part I: Exercise for Non-native Speakers. Englewood Cliffs, NJ: Prentice Hall Regents.
